version_description:
1. New EV setting for camera
2. Can use grid lines when shooting
3. Can save photo to phone album now
4. Can use imperial units
5. The altitude limitation is up to 500 meters now
6. Some improvement of checking battery
7. Some UI improvement
8. Fix some bugs

1. Optimized firmware update.
2. Enhanced GPS settings compatibility.
3. Suitable for USB Dongle accessories.
4. Optimized WeChat, facebook sharing function.
5. Coordinates correction available
6. Merged the Chinese version.
No Fly Zone data base updated

1.【4K】New IMU function
2.【4K】New Camera menu
3.【4K】Can adjust headlights in App now
4.【4K】New mode selection for Camera
5.【4K】Can automatically turn off lights when taking photos
6.【4K】Can set RTH altitude during flight now
7. Bug fixes

1. ［4K］New dynamic No Fly Zone
2. ［4K］New camera reset feature
3. ［4K］New magnetic field feature
4. ［4K］New gimbal adjustment feature
5. New gimbal angle display
6. New RTH altitude reminder
7. New full screen feature
8. New phone direction display
9. New current flight mode display

Big update for Mi Drone APP! We are happy to announce that the new App supports our new product, Gimbal Camera Handle now. With 3-axis stabilised camera of 4K drone, we provide more ways for you to explore the world.

New features:

1. Can choose device to connect
2. Live streaming view for 4K camera
3. Library for photos and videos
4. Camera settings include photo size & video resolutions
5. Handle joystick settings
6. Display of handle battery and camera EV
